subject: Public Speaking
title: Patrick Henry: Liberty or Death
description: One-minute skill: Patrick Henry: Liberty or Death.

hook.text: Give me liberty or give me death. Seven words that sparked independence.

buildup.text: Henry persuaded hesitant colonists to rebel against Britain.

discovery.text: He used repetition, escalating stakes, and urgent moral language.

twist.text: His speech had no written record yet influenced history.

climax.text: One rousing speech can tip historical moments.

punchline.text: One speech can change history. Speak accordingly.
